project_abstract.cdata: The Pensions Administration and Health Insurance Project provides technical assistance, fellowships, training, preparation of studies, computer hardware and software, equipment, teaching materials, limited civil works and refurbishment of facilities, and incremental recurrent costs. Special attention will be given to issues of long-term financial sustainability and efficiency. The project consists of the following two components: 1) management development and planning, comprising project management, systems planning and organization, planning development unit, and preinvestment studies; and 2) operational infrastructure, comprising application software and technology infrastructure.
